description.ko: 보이지 않는 것을 보이게 함으로써, 음파가 공기를 조각하는 찰나를 포착합니다.
description.en: The invisible made visible, capturing the moment a sound wave sculpts the very air it travels through.

prompt: Octane Render, 8k, raytracing. Three-dimensional soundwaves frozen in space, resembling concentric rings of liquid gold and electric blue mercury suspended in mid-air. Minimalist background with sharp focus on vibrating frequencies and minimal lines reacting to an invisible sonic boom. Dramatic global illumination and raytraced reflections on fluid metallic surfaces.
